directions: Whisk vinegar and mustard in medium bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oil. Stir in parsley, poppy seeds and shallot. Season vinaigrette to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate. Bring to room temperature and rewhisk before using.)

Steam potatoes until tender, about 8 minutes. Transfer to large bowl. Mix in broth and wine. Let stand 5 minutes. Pour vinaigrette over warm potatoes. Toss gently. Season with salt and pepper. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: 3 pounds small red-skinned potatoes, cut into 1/4-inch-thick rounds
title: French Potato Salad
